website_summaries.verdict: A good quality sink from a reliable manufacturer, in four neutral color choices to fit your bathroom.
pros: A nice sink that is wide
Design includes space for soap and hides the water lines well
Easy to use for face washing
Sturdy and fairly easy to install
cons: Comes with a single hole for the faucet, so make sure your fixture will work

customer_reviews.title: The sink is perfect.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink. Enough flat surface on the back for a soap dispenser and the bowl perfectly deep and wide. It was a bit hard to get connected (just not much room to get your hands in to make the connections). However, it was do-able, and the result is great. We had a vanity and went to this pedestal, so we had our plumbing raised to hide the plumbing better. (You can't see the plumbing at all unless you look hard for it.) We went with the biscuit color, which is quite versatile. Would definitely buy this again. No defects at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mason's Mom

customer_reviews.title: nicely designed, well packaged and as easy to install ...
customer_reviews.text: It's Kohler which means it's well made, nicely designed, well packaged and as easy to install as a pedestal sink can be. I've always found Kohler worth the extra few dollars. In person this particular sink is very attractive. Obviously is matches in design and color the cimarron line of products, but it is also classic enough to really match any of your other fixtures. It has ver clean lines that could be modern or traditional.
customer_reviews.author: Peffinger

customer_reviews.title: Kohler sink and toliet
customer_reviews.text: I am remodeling my bathroom. The house Bathroom is very small. The small sink is perfect and I bought a Kholarl Toliet to go with it and the toliet is a round ad give AP much more appropriate for a small bathroom. I’ll tell you what, the Toliet Cavan flush!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne A Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and sturdy, installed it myself fairly easily. Word to the wise: make sure you check that you don't already have a support cross-beam behind the wall where you are mounting this. I failed to find mine with a stud finder, cut open the drywall and then found the beam, lots of wasted work (totally my fault, sink is great).
customer_reviews.author: Dan Andreescu

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: One of the things about our tiny bathroom is that there isn't enough room for a vanity. Most pedistal sinks don't have room for toothbrushes and soap. This serves as a vanity without taking up too much space. Don't buy the 50 dollar pedistal sink! Ours cracked when something dropped on it. Be sure to get a quality one hole faucet (at least 60+ bucks) and a drain.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Well Packaged, Quick Delivery, Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking sink and plenty tall too. Arrived VERY well packaged with no damage. Pulled a vanity out of a small half bath and installed this. It makes the bathroom seem much larger.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sink and it fits our spot perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sink and it fits our spot perfectly, exactly what we were looking for. Just be careful what kind of faucet you choose.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Nice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and install. Excellent quality for our re-furbished bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: DW from Florida

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!!!
customer_reviews.text: After looking endlessly for an affordable pedestal sink we fell in love with this one. Most of the pedestal sinks were really short. We are not extremely tall, but wanted a pedestal sink comfortable enough to use on a daily basis and not feel like you had to bend so much! We ended up ordering 2 of these and they are very modern and sleek yet a perfect height and width! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: sisterpastor

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: great sink, very high quality. delivery issue with item coming from a third party
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect to my 5x4 feet bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I received sooner than expected. It fits perfect to my 5x4 feet bathroom. I like this and recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: chang-june yoon

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The sink is discontinued, so it was hard trying to find it.......but thanks to Amazon, this sink is installed in my powder room. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Kohler pedestal sink. Does not come with drain etc. I used a professional plumber to install. He had to use parts from his truck & buy a drain at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Designed for Floor Drain
customer_reviews.text: Cannot install in bathroom with floor drain. Not designed for floor drain.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Came quickly. It was just the right size for our 1/2 bath. We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-2362-1-96 Cimarron Pedestal Bathroom Sink with Single-Hole Faucet Drilling, Biscuit
product_meta.description:
Color:BiscuitThe Cimarron collection combines the best of traditional and contemporary design for a versatile look that complements a range of bathroom styles. Beveled edges and simple lines enhance the uniquely shaped basin.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
With its transitional aesthetic, the Cimarron Ensemble affords a complete design solution with ease of selection.
feature_bullets: Generous interior basin and deck size
Pedestal designed to conceal water supplies and drain
